Trade/Device Name(s): Dimension Vista CTNI Flex reagent cartridge
Regulation Name(s): Creatine phosphokinase/creatine kinase or isoenzymes test system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Dimension Vista CTNI Flex reagent cartridge, a chemiluminescent immunoassay for cardiac troponin I on the Dimension Vista System.
Indications for Use Summary: For quantitative measurement of cardiac troponin I in human serum and plasma on the Dimension Vista System to aid diagnosis of acute myocardial infarction and risk stratification of acute coronary syndrome patients.
